name: MINILAND (eboatwright)
description:
Build, mine, craft, do whatever you want!

PICO-8 Game Remastered!

Made in Pure Java with no Libraries or Engines!

Changelog on the Trello board!

https://trello.com/b/pM3l84Pl/miniland

**CONTROLS:**

Cursor / Arrow Keys - Movement, Selecting Menus

Z - Open Inventory

X - Open Crafting Menu, Exit Build Mode

C - Mining, Selecting

Escape - Save and Quit

Select a block (with C) from your inventory to go into build mode. C to place and X to exit.

Select an item (with C) in the crafting menu to craft it, and it will go into your inventory.
